abilities.name: Ancestral Fortune
abilities.rule: Once per turn, you can change one Hit roll, or one Wound roll made for this model to an unmodified 6.

abilities.name: Grim Efficiency
abilities.rule: Once per battle round, in your Command phase, you can select one model from your army with this ability, then select one enemy unit that is visible to that model. That enemy unit gains 1 Judgement token.

abilities.name: The Destined
abilities.rule: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 1.

abilities.name: Rampart Crest
abilities.rule: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

wargear_abilities.name: Rampart Crest
wargear_abilities.rule: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.
